name: ModifyFileSystemShortcut
description:
Update a file system shortcut in a specified project.

Use this tool to update details of a file system shortcut within a project. This can be helpful for managing project shortcuts by modifying them as needed.

parameters.name: file_system_shortcut_id
parameters.description: The UUID string identifying the file system shortcut to be updated.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the project you want to update the file system shortcut for. Retrieve this ID by calling /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: shortcut_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the file system shortcut to be updated.

parameters.name: file_system_path
parameters.description: The file system path of the shortcut to be updated. Provide the exact path within the project.

parameters.name: creation_timestamp
parameters.description: A string representing the creation date and time of the shortcut. Format: ISO 8601 (e.g., '2021-09-15T13:45:30Z').

parameters.name: shortcut_type
parameters.description: Specifies the type of the file system shortcut to update. Accepted values may vary based on use case.

parameters.name: reference_identifier
parameters.description: A unique string identifier for the file system shortcut to be updated. This is used to specify which shortcut you are modifying.

parameters.name: file_system_shortcut_href
parameters.description: The URL of the file system shortcut to be updated. It specifies the link to the resource.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this file system shortcut.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this file system shortcut.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
